name: Uphill Bus Driving Adventure
description:
Are you a nature, bus, or driving enthusiast? Then buckle up for the ultimate trip!

With twists, turns and "the Climb", are you ready for an Uphill Bus Adventure! This game is going to brings you an exciting, fun-filled extreme experience. The view is to die-for and the mission is adventurous! It’s quite like testing your driving skills.

Dodge hurdles and drive your bus over steep hills to complete exciting missions packed with intense challenges. Watch out not fall! Be ready for sudden twists and turns. It’s your primary responsibility to drop off your passengers at their destination on TIME and yes SAFELY!

Push that throttle, steer, and try your best to pick and drop in tricky, hilly spots. Immersive realistic missions and hill bus driving experience waiting for you in this bus driving simulation game. Enjoy the dangerous curvy hill roads and gameplay revolves around the mountains, hill tops, water, rocks and beautiful natural scenes.

Get rewards for completing each mission and use it to buy and upgrade the modern vehicles. The difficulty level gradually increase with completion of levels. 3D Models, Perfect Control, Sudden Turns, Twisty Roads, Realistic Arts and Awesome Soundtrack are going to lead you on a new journey of excitement!

Get ready to feel the thrill on hill climbing!

Uphill Bus Adventure Happy Driving Game Features:
• Amazing Hill Station Environment and 3D graphics
• Thrilling precision driving missions.
• Awesome and Realistic Vehicles to choose from.
• Realistic Physics based game play.
• Enjoyable Sounds Effects.
• Animated Passengers.
• Realistic & Intelligent Traffic system.
